title: Russia-Ukraine updates: Kremlin convoy ‘stalled’ north of Kyiv as rockets hit major cities; U.S. taps oil reserves
content:
1. Russia-Ukraine updates: Kremlin convoy ‘stalled’ north of Kyiv as rockets hit major cities; U.S. taps oil reserves  The Philadelphia Inquirer
  2. Russia's 40-mile convoy appears to have bogged down en route to Kyiv; shells pound Ukrainian city of Kharkiv. Live updates.  USA TODAY
  3. Russia-Ukraine War: Live News and Updates  The New York Times
  4. Russia-Ukraine war: Live updates  The Washington Post
  5. The Latest: Russian strike on second-largest city chills Ukraine  KOAT New Mexico
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロシア・ウクライナの最新情報。ロケットが主要都市を襲う中、クレムリンの車列はキエフの北で「停滞」、米国は石油備蓄を利用する。
俄罗斯-乌克兰最新消息。克里姆林宫车队在基辅以北 "停滞不前"，火箭弹袭击主要城市；美国挖掘石油储备
俄羅斯-烏克蘭最新消息。克里姆林宮車隊在基輔以北 "停滯不前"，火箭彈襲擊主要城市；美國挖掘石油儲備
